## Welcome!

Welcome to my data project: **Exploring Yelp Toronto Businesses and Their Reviews in Relation to Nearby Attractions**.

This project investigates how Toronto businesses listed on Yelp relate to nearby tourist attractions, using geographic and review data to uncover meaningful patterns. The analysis includes data cleaning, spatial matching, exploratory data analysis (EDA), and predictive modeling.
